newsitem.title: USA: U.S blue-chip stocks edge higher.
newsitem.headline: U.S blue-chip stocks edge higher.

text.p: U.S. blue-chip stocks edged higher Wednesday, boosted by a rally in bonds and high-technology shares, a day after the market ended lower when the Federal Reserve decided to hold interest rates steady.
Based on early and unofficial data, the Dow Jones industrial average ended up 3.33 points at 5,877.36.
In the broader market, advancing issues led declines 12-10 on active volume of about 451 million shares on the New York Stock Exchange.
